entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border on iOS redraws with 1 frame lag, creating flashes of (1) square corners on redraws, and (2) old background color before new color update #23070
  • Cannot publish iOS from Windows after connecting to Mac #23069
  • Grouped CollectionView fires IndexOutOfBoundsException from MauiRecyclerView after second collapse/expand #23068
  • My mac doesnt show up #23067
  • Cannot reference Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson version 8.0.6 in net8.0-ios #23066
  • MAUI App Scaling Issue on Windows #23065
  • UITests broken for net9 #23064
    9.0-preview6
  • Maui Essentials Permissions CheckStatusAsync<LocationWhenInUse> Or CheckStatusAsync<LocationAlways> returns Denied instead of restricted #23060
  • Add Maui 8.0.60 to list of Versions (etc) #23059
  • Image Loaded event not firing in 8.0.60 version which is used to fire in 8.0.40 and earlier versions. Selected 8.0.40 I am unable to see 8.0.60 #23058
    .NET 8 SR7
  • [Windows] App based on FlyoutPage uses incorrect title bar colours when system is set to Dark theme and app set to Light theme - illegible content #23057
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Layouts which work fine in iOS are blank in Android, but suddenly work if "touched" via hot reload. #23056
  • Got error XA0129: Error deploying 'files/.__override__/System.Data.Common.dll'. #23055
  • Display the text from the beginning part when the Entry control loses focus #23054
  • PanGestureRecognizer not working for iOS #23053
  • View cell Tapgesture not working for MAUI8.0 #23051
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element: Warning: The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.RoundRectangle has been Garbage Collected. This should never happen. Please log a bug: https://github.com/dotnet/maui #23050
  • [Android] Crash on startup after enabling LLVM #23048

Closed

  • ListView items disappearing while scrolling on iOS #23062
  • AndroidAttachDebugger=true causes app to crash, but AndroidAttachDebugger=false doesn't. #22979
  • DatePicker FontAttributes="Bold" and FontAttributes="Italic" Not Working on IOS or MacCatalyst #16272
  • Setting entry text from binding before user interaction sets null on iOS #22357
  • Memory leak with GraphicsView in windows #17214
  • Text inside ContentView doesn't update when using an async command on iOS #7281
  • [iOS] No Background is rendered on Borders with Shadows #7015
  • CollectionView does not highlight selected item on Android but works on windows #13885
  • [Android] If to set SystemUiVisibility = SystemUiFlags.HideNavigation on Android, then Flyout Items are not displayed. #8575
  • Label TextColor does not update on theme change when using FormattedText #16431
  • XamlC error XC0009 with CommunityToolkit.Maui.Popup with Dotnet 9 Preview 5 #23042
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error #19649
  • remove_RequestedThemeChanged cause null reference #20551
  • TapGestureRecognizer popUpTapGesture = new TapGestureRecognizer(); not working #20007
  • ColectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReached is constatli coled #22101
  • CollectionView - ItemsUpdatingScrollMode="KeepScrollOffset" does not work in Windows #22162
  • Layout incorrect after visibility is toggled of a child view #22358
  • CollectionView SelectableItemsViewAdapter System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexMustBeLess Arg_ParamName_Name, index #20764
  • .NET MAUI Problem with rendering RecyclerView.ViewHolder on Android #21895

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SR6 to issue template #23071
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨
  • [iOS] TapGestureRecognizer should not fire when view is not enabled #23049

Updated

  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, .NET 9 Planning
  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Move to 9.0.100.preview6 #23021
  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • [XC] compile OnIdiom #21799
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] FilePicker picking multiple files is very slow because of `FutureAccessList` use #23047
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
